Body:
port_a, state_a, amount_a, port_b, state_b, amount_b = (0, motor.POWER, 100,
    3, motor.POWER, 100)
async with connect_dummy(Commands.multipart_motor_requests, port_a, state_a,
    amount_a, port_b, state_b, amount_b) as client:
    await client.commands(client.move_motor_cmd(port_a, amount_a, state_a),
        client.move_motor_cmd(port_b, amount_b, state_b))
port_a, state_a, amount_a, port_b, state_b, amount_b = (0, motor.POWER, 100,
    4, motor.POWER, 100)
async with connect_dummy(Commands.multipart_motor_requests, port_a, state_a,
    amount_a, port_b, state_b, amount_b) as client:
    with pytest.raises(errors.FailedCommandError):
        await client.commands(client.move_motor_cmd(port_a, amount_a,
            state_a), client.move_motor_cmd(port_b, amount_b, state_b))
pytest.mark.asyncio
